this way I can plop it on the table and I mean hey it's D&D it's an imagination

it's a mix of pink insulation foam and dollar-store foam core so when I when I

together and this top little four section so I started by making eight

a way to cover the exposed foam core corners so I decided that since I wanted
this to have a big kind of heavy timbered look any way that I would just
cover it with big Timbers essentially so I cut
the pink insulation foam into half inch by half inch sticks and then I actually
just took a knife and cut out from both sides a dado I should a rabbet I guess
